AlienRace.ThingDef_AlienRace.label: grey, short
AlienRace.ThingDef_AlienRace.description:
<color=#aeaeae>The Assembly's biocracy</color> is composed of engineered clades diffused by task, with the primogenitor species of “Zetan Reticulan” forming the root of an organizational structure that can be traced back to an early genealogical disaster.
<color=#aeaeae>A naturally evolved psy-limbic system assured that bio-development was the preferred path of their society's earliest transcendental technologies, superseding spaceflight by nearly a millennium as their world began to boil in the mucilage of it's new science. An innocuous beginning of curative therapies and natal screening quickly expanded into a hyper-evolutionary arms race as these new discoveries concentrated among those with first access. Fierce social competition drove mass grafting, therapeutic patches slowly modified the flesh, and expansive body cults formed.
Genocide soon swept the surface of the Reticulan's homeworld as gene-jacked armies of morphomatic commandos clashed. The planet's population gored itself down from billions to thousands as the unchanged were thrown into great flesh pots and rend into ribonucleic mash. In time global infrastructure ground down due to brutal conflict, with vast areas of the planet turned into barren slate and blasted clay pits.
In these first centuries of frenzy one of these catabolic kings, a neo-being who had taken the name of “Ze'tan”, came to know a deep regret for his part in the annihilation.
Ze'tan in his shame retreated from the battlefield of the world above and slunk below his planet's frosted grey surface clay into the darkness beneath. Hundreds of kilometres under the planet's surface in a lattice work of deep natural chasms and machine bored tunnels he found redemption. In this hidden reticulum Ze'tan set up vast womb chambers and mapped a new genograph that closely resembled that of his original species before it was distorted by genetic crush; with only a minimum number of competitive gene-modifications added.
Finally after years of bio-printing his reformist army Ze'Tan's reticulum emerged onto the mudded ruins of the old world. The remaining megalomanic super entities were trapped inside their assorted pleasure forts and lazed into vapour by the reticulum's resurgent legions. Pulsating flesh-circuit fields, the organic extension of distended genelich bodies, were put to light and from space the dimly lit sphere twinkled as clone legions cleansed the fallen remnants of their ancestors.
During the global reconstruction that followed a set of advisories were established through who's adherence would safeguard the race's redux. Strictly regulated regime and compartmentalization were to be permanently enforced. Populations were sealed off in mass from one another to avoid another cascading failure like initial the biospiral that had almost claimed the race.</color>
